TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Splitter extends System.Windows.Forms.Control

summary.span: 表示允许用户调整停靠控件大小的拆分器控件。

span.span: Represents a splitter control that enables the user to resize docked controls.

summary.span: 已被 取代，且仅为与早期版本兼容而提供。

span.span: has been replaced by and is provided only for compatibility with previous versions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件使用户能够在运行时调整停靠到 控件边缘的控件的大小。The control enables the user to resize controls that are docked to the edges of the control at run time. 当用户将鼠标指针传递到 控件上时，光标将发生变化，以指示停靠到 控件的控件可以调整大小。When the user passes the mouse pointer over the control, the cursor changes to indicate that the controls docked to the control can be resized. 用户可以通过 控件调整停靠顺序中紧前面的停靠控件的大小。The control enables the user to resize the docked control that is immediately before it in the docking order. 因此，若要使用户能够调整停靠控件的大小，请将希望用户能够调整大小的控件停靠到容器的边缘，然后将拆分器停靠到该容器的同一端。Therefore, to enable the user to resize a docked control, dock the control you want the user to be able to resize to an edge of a container, and then dock a splitter to the same side of that container. 例如，若要创建类似于 Windows 资源管理器的窗口，请将 控件添加到窗体，并将其 属性设置为 "`DockStyle.Left`"。For example, to create a window similar to Windows Explorer, add a control to a form and set its property to `DockStyle.Left`. 将 控件添加到窗体，并将其 属性设置为 "`DockStyle.Left`"。Add a control to the form and set its property to `DockStyle.Left` as well. 若要完成窗体布局，请添加一个 控件，并将其 属性设置为 `DockStyle.Fill`，使 占据窗体上剩余的空间。To complete the form layout, add a control and set its property to `DockStyle.Fill` to have the occupy the remaining space on the form. 在运行时，用户可以通过移动 控件来调整 控件（以及 控件）的宽度。At run time, the user can then resize the width of the control (as well as the control) by moving the control. 若要确保 控件不会调整停靠到大小太小而无法用于用户的控件的大小，可使用 和 属性。To ensure that the control does not resize controls docked to a size that is too small to be useful to the user, you use the and properties. "" 和 " 属性" 确定控件停靠到左侧和右侧的最小大小（或水平 控件的顶部和底部）可调整到的大小。The and properties determine the minimum size that controls docked to the left and right (or top and bottom if a horizontal control) can be sized to. 如果窗体上 控件停靠的其他控件显示特定样式的边框，则可以使用 属性来匹配停靠的控件的边框样式。If the other controls on your form that the control is docked to display a specific style of border, you can use the property to match the border style of the controls that are docked to it. 你可能希望对 控件停靠到的控件设置最大大小限制。You might want to set a maximum size limit on controls that the control is docked to. 使用 和 事件可以确定用户调整停靠控件的大小的时间。The and events enable you to determine when the user is resizing a docked control. 您可以在事件处理程序中使用 或 事件的 属性来确定 控件停靠到的控件大小，并将 属性设置为不同的值，以将停靠控件的宽度限制为指定的最大宽度（如果水平对齐 控件，则为高度）。You can use the property in an event handler for the or events to determine the size of the control that the control is docked to and set the property to a different value to limit the docked control's width to a specified maximum width (or height if a horizontally aligned control). > [!NOTE] > 使用 控件调整控件大小只能用鼠标来完成。Resizing a control using the control can only be done using the mouse. 不能使用键盘访问 控件。It is not possible to access the control using the keyboard. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 控件与 和 控件结合使用，以创建类似于 Windows 资源管理器的窗口。The following code example uses a control in combination with and controls to create a window similar to Windows Explorer. 若要确定 和 控件，请将节点和项添加到这两个控件中。To identify the and controls, nodes and items are added to both controls. 该示例使用了 的 和 属性，以防止 或 控件调整到太小或太大。The example uses the and properties of the to prevent the or control from being sized too small or too large. 此示例要求在 中定义在此示例中创建的方法，并在 的构造函数中调用方法。This example requires that the method created in this example is defined within a and that the method is called from the constructor of the . [!code-cpp[Splitter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Splitter Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Splitter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Splitter Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Splitter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Splitter Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下， 和 属性设置为25。By default, the and properties are set to 25. 默认情况下， 属性设置为 `DockStyle.Left`。The property is set to `DockStyle.Left` by default. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 控件与 和 控件结合使用，以创建类似于 Windows 资源管理器的窗口。The following code example uses a control in combination with and controls to create a window similar to Windows Explorer. 若要确定 和 控件，请将节点和项添加到这两个控件中。To identify the and controls, nodes and items are added to both controls. 该示例使用了 的 和 属性，以防止 或 控件调整到太小或太大。The example uses the and properties of the to prevent the or control from being sized too small or too large. 此示例要求在 中定义在此示例中创建的方法，并在 的构造函数中调用方法。This example requires that the method created in this example is defined within a and that the method is called from the constructor of the . summary.span: 获取或设置控件的边框样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the style of border for the control.

summary.span: 已被 取代，且仅为与早期版本兼容而提供。

One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性通常在 控件停靠的控件以特定边框样式显示，并且您希望 控件与其显示样式匹配时使用。This property is typically used when the controls the control is docked to are displayed with a specific border style and you want the control to match their display style. 例如，如果你有一个 和一个 控件， 控件将停靠到你想要显示的，而没有任何边框，则可以将 属性设置为 `BorderStyle.None`。For example, if you have a and a control that the control will be docked to that you want to display without any borders, you can set the property to `BorderStyle.None`.

exception.span: 该属性的值并非 值之一。

span.span: The value of the property is not one of the values.

summary.span: 获取或设置要停靠在其父控件上的 边框，并确定 如何随其父控件一起调整大小。

span.span: Gets or sets which borders are docked to its parent control and determines how a is resized with its parent.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可定义控件在其父控件调整大小时自动调整大小的方式。Use the property to define how a control is automatically resized as its parent control is resized. 只能将 属性设置为 、、或 。You can only set the property to , , , or . 用户可以通过 控件调整停靠顺序中紧前面的停靠控件的大小。The control enables the user to resize the docked control that is immediately before it in the docking order. 因此，若要使用户能够调整停靠控件的大小，请将该控件停靠到容器的边缘，然后将 控件停靠到该容器的同一侧。Therefore, to enable the user to resize a docked control, dock the control to an edge of a container, and then dock a control to the same side of that container. 有关详细信息，请参阅 类中的示例。For more information, see the example in the class.

summary.span: 获取或设置在拆分器控件与容器另一侧的边缘（或停靠到该侧的最近控件）之间必须保留的最小距离。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum distance that must remain between the splitter control and the edge of the opposite side of the container (or the closest control docked to that side).

summary.span: 已为 中的类似属性所取代，提供它仅是为了兼容早期版本。

span.span: has been replaced by similar properties in and is provided only for compatibility with previous versions.

value.span: 在 控件与容器另一侧的边缘（或停靠到该侧的最近控件）之间的最小距离，以像素表示。

span.span: The minimum distance, in pixels, between the control and the edge of the opposite side of the container (or the closest control docked to that side).
The default is 25.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于水平 控件（停靠到容器的顶部或底部的 控件），为移除的控件保留的容器区域的最小高度为此值减去 控件的高度。For a horizontal control (a control docked to the top or bottom of a container), the minimum height of the area of the container reserved for undocked controls is this value minus the height of the control. 对于垂直 控件（停靠到容器左侧或右侧的 控件），为移除的控件保留的容器区域的最小宽度是此值减去 控件的宽度。For a vertical control (a control docked to the left or right of a container), the minimum width of the area of the container reserved for undocked controls is this value minus the width of the control. 用户不能将拆分器移过此属性指定的限制。The user cannot move the splitter past the limit specified by this property. > [!NOTE] > 如果 属性设置为负值，则属性值将重置为0。If the property is set to a negative value, the property value is reset to 0. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 控件与 和 控件结合使用，以创建类似于 Windows 资源管理器的窗口。The following code example uses a control in combination with and controls to create a window similar to Windows Explorer. 若要确定 和 控件，请将节点和项添加到这两个控件中。To identify the and controls, nodes and items are added to both controls. 该示例使用了 的 和 属性，以防止 或 控件调整到太小或太大。The example uses the and properties of the to prevent the or control from being sized too small or too large. 此示例要求在 中定义在此示例中创建的方法，并在 的构造函数中调用方法。This example requires that the method created in this example is defined within a and that the method is called from the constructor of the . [!code-cpp[Splitter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Splitter Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Splitter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Splitter Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Splitter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Splitter Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置拆分器控件和控件停靠的容器边缘之间必须保持的最小距离。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum distance that must remain between the splitter control and the container edge that the control is docked to.

summary.span: 已被 和 取代，且仅为与早期版本兼容而提供。

span.span: has been replaced by and and is provided only for compatibility with previous versions.

value.span: 在 控件与该控件停靠到的容器边缘之间的最小距离，以像素表示。

span.span: The minimum distance, in pixels, between the control and the container edge that the control is docked to.
The default is 25.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于水平 控件（停靠到容器的顶部或底部的 控件），此值是可调整大小的控件的最小高度。For a horizontal control (a control docked to the top or bottom of a container), this value is the minimum height of the resizable control. 对于垂直 控件（停靠在容器左侧或右侧的 控件），此值是可调整大小的控件的最小宽度。For a vertical control (a control docked to the left or right of a container), this value is the minimum width of the resizable control. 用户不能将拆分器移过此属性指定的限制。The user cannot move the splitter past the limit specified by this property. > [!NOTE] > 如果 属性设置为负值，则属性值将重置为0。If the property is set to a negative value, the property value is reset to 0. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 控件与 和 控件结合使用，以创建类似于 Windows 资源管理器的窗口。The following code example uses a control in combination with and controls to create a window similar to Windows Explorer. 若要确定 和 控件，请将节点和项添加到这两个控件中。To identify the and controls, nodes and items are added to both controls. 该示例使用了 的 和 属性，以防止 或 控件调整到太小或太大。The example uses the and properties of the to prevent the or control from being sized too small or too large. 此示例要求在 中定义在此示例中创建的方法，并在 的构造函数中调用方法。This example requires that the method created in this example is defined within a and that the method is called from the constructor of the . [!code-cpp[Splitter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Splitter Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Splitter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Splitter Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Splitter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Splitter Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法开始拖动 `Splitter` 控件，以调整停靠顺序中紧靠 `Splitter` 之前的停靠控件的大小。The method begins dragging the `Splitter` control to resize the docked control that is immediately before `Splitter` in the docking order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果用户按住鼠标左键并移动鼠标， 方法将移动 控件，以调整停靠顺序中紧靠 之前的停靠控件的大小。If the user holds down left mouse button and moves the mouse, the method moves the control to resize the docked control that is immediately before in the docking order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 获取或设置拆分器控件和控件停靠的容器边缘之间的距离。

span.span: Gets or sets the distance between the splitter control and the container edge that the control is docked to.

summary.span: 已被 和 取代，且仅为与早期版本兼容而提供。

span.span: has been replaced by and and is provided only for compatibility with previous versions.

value.span: 在 控件与该控件停靠到的容器边缘之间的距离，以像素表示。

span.span: The distance, in pixels, between the control and the container edge that the control is docked to.

value.span: 如果 控件未绑定到一个控件，则值为 -1。

span.span: If the control is not bound to a control, the value is -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于水平 控件（停靠到容器的顶部或底部的 控件），此值是可调整大小的控件的高度。For a horizontal control (a control docked to the top or bottom of a container), this value is the height of the resizable control. 对于垂直 控件（停靠在容器左侧或右侧的 控件），此值是可调整大小的控件的宽度。For a vertical control (a control docked to the left or right of a container), this value is the width of the resizable control. 您可以在事件处理程序中使用 或 事件的 属性来确定 控件停靠到的控件大小，并将其宽度限制为指定的最大宽度（如果水平停靠 控件，则为高度）。You can use the property in an event handler for the or events to determine the size of the control that the control is docked to and limit its width to a specified maximum width (or height if a horizontally docked control).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SplitterMoved As SplitterEventHandler

summary.span: 当移动拆分器控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the splitter control is moved.

summary.span: 已被 取代，且仅为与早期版本兼容而提供。

span.span: has been replaced by and is provided only for compatibility with previous versions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以为 事件创建事件处理程序，以便在应用程序中执行调整大小验证。You can create an event handler for the event to perform resize validation in your application. 例如，如果 控件停靠到 控件的边缘和 控件上，则可以在 事件中编写代码，以确定是否已超出 和 控件的最小值和/或最大大小，并将控件的大小调整为最小值或最大大小。For example, if a control is docked to the edges of a control and a control, you can write code in the event to determine if the minimum and/or maximum size for the and controls has been exceeded and resize the controls to their minimum or maximum size. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告 事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑将 替换为 或将消息附加到多行 中。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为 `Splitter1` 类型实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `Splitter1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与 事件关联。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#550](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#550)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#550](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#550)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以为 事件创建事件处理程序，以便在应用程序中执行调整大小验证。You can create an event handler for the event to perform resize validation in your application. 例如，如果 控件停靠到 控件的边缘和 控件上，则可以在 事件中编写代码，以确定是否已超过 控件和 控件的最小值和/或最大大小，并将控件大小限制为最小或最大大小。For example, if a control is docked to the edges of a control and a control, you can write code in the event to determine if the minimum and/or maximum size for the and controls has been exceeded and restrict the resizing of the controls to their minimum or maximum size. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告 事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑将 替换为 或将消息附加到多行 中。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为 `Splitter1` 类型实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `Splitter1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与 事件关联。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
